00022 #ifndef EMGENDERCELLISTENER_H
00023 #define EMGENDERCELLISTENER_H
00024 
00025 //
00026 #include "chipstream/BioTypes.h"
00027 #include "chipstream/GenderCelListener.h"
00028 #include "chipstream/ProbeListFactory.h"
00029 #include "chipstream/ProbeSet.h"
00030 //
00031 #include <cstring>
00032 #include <string>
00033 #include <utility>
00034 #include <vector>
00035 //
00036 
00037 /**
00038  * @brief Class for determining gender from a cel set of cel files.
00039  */
00040 class EmGenderCelListener : public GenderCelListener {
00041 
00042 public:
00043 
00044   /** 
00045    * Constructor.
00046    * @param chrXpSets - Vector of chrX probesets that are not in the
00047    * pseudo autosomal region and should be haploid in males and
00048    * diploid in females.
00049    */
00050   EmGenderCelListener(std::vector<ProbeListPacked> &chrXpSets,
00051                       double k = 4.0f,
00052                       double emThresh = 0.05f,
00053                       double emCutOff = 0.5f,
00054                       double genderCutOff = 0.1f 
00055                       );
00056   
00057   /**
00058    * Virtual destructor.
00059    */
00060   virtual ~EmGenderCelListener(){}
00061 
00062   /** 
00063    * Process another cel files worth of data.
00064    * @param cel - Filehandle to open cel file.
00065    */
00066   void newChip(affymetrix_fusion_io::FusionCELData *cel);
00067 
00068   /** 
00069    * Get the genders for the cel files that have been seen.
00070    * @return - vector of gender calls, one for each cel file in order seen.
00071    */
00072   std::vector<affx::Gender> getGenders() { return m_Genders; }
00073   
00074   /** 
00075    * Get the names for the cel files that have been seen.
00076    * @return - vector of cel file names, one for each cel file in order seen.
00077    */
00078   std::vector<std::string> getCelNames() { return m_CelNames;  }
00079 
00080   /** 
00081    * Loop through the probesets provided and calculate a contrast value
00082    * for each one using the median of PM probes for A allele and B
00083    * allele. (CCS Space)
00084    * @param cel - Cel File to get data from.
00085    * @param chrXProbeSets - Probesets to process (should be chrX non-pseudo autosomal).
00086    * @param contrastValues - Contrast values vector to be filled in.
00087    */
00088   static void fillInContrastValues(affymetrix_fusion_io::FusionCELData *cel, 
00089                                    std::vector<ProbeListPacked> &chrXProbeSets, 
00090                                    std::vector<double> &contrastValues, 
00091                                    double k = 4);
00092 
00093   /**
00094    * Calculate the contrast value for a single probeset
00095    * @param cel - Cel File to get data from.
00096    * @param ps - pointer to ProbeSet
00097    * @param contrastValues - Contrast values vector to be filled in.
00098    * @return contrast value
00099    */
00100   static double CalculateEMContrast(affymetrix_fusion_io::FusionCELData* cel, 
00101                                     const ProbeSet* ps, const double k);
00102 
00103   /**
00104    * @brief EM-based gender calling algorithm, call gender on a single
00105    * sample. 
00106    * @param contrast - vector of allele contrasts from SNPs on X chromosome
00107    * @param em_thresh - threshold on EM's confidence of labelling
00108    * @param em_cutoff - cutoff on total number of SNPs passed em's threshold, below cutoff return unknown
00109    * @param gender_cutoff - cutoff on percentage of heterozygotes of SNPs which passed the threshold
00110    *
00111    * @param gender - gender var to be filled in
00112    * @param hcr - estimated chrX het rate to be filled in
00113    */
00114    static void CallGender(const std::vector<double>& contrast,
00115                           const double em_thresh,
00116                           const double em_cutoff,
00117                           const double gender_cutoff,
00118                           affx::Gender &gender,
00119                           double &hcr);
00120     
00121    static void CallGender(const std::vector<double>& contrast,
00122                           affx::Gender &gender,
00123                           double &hcr);
00124 
00125  protected:
00126 
00127   /// Vector of chrX probesets that are not in the pseudo autosomal
00128   /// region and should be haploid in males and diploid in females.
00129   /// Pointer memory is owned elsewhere...
00130   std::vector<ProbeListPacked> m_ChrXProbeSets;
00131   /// Name of the cel files that have been called.
00132   std::vector<std::string> m_CelNames;
00133   /// Gender calls for chips seen.
00134   std::vector<affx::Gender> m_Genders;
00135   /// Our K parameter for the contrast centers transformation.
00136   double m_K; 
00137   /// EM Threshold to use
00138   double m_EmThresh;
00139   double m_EmCutOff;
00140   double m_GenderCutOff;
00141 };
00142 
00143 #endif /* EMGENDERCELLISTENER_H */
